pageContext.title: THE RUDY SCHWARTZ PROJECT â€“ Full Frontal Klugman
pageContext.content: Another rancid blast of obscenity from the frigid Canadian North, courtesy of the gang of degenerates at The Rudy Schwartz Project. This one traverses a musical cesspool that includes dissonant ambience, doo-wop, latin rhythms,and compelling inducements to pull snot out of your own face. Sure to satisfy even the most discriminating party-goer or hipster douchebag. Limited CD pressing, so get it while it lasts.
